name: Just Find School
description: Web app allowing teenagers to rate their highschool in 4 categories and leave textual opinion. It was used by over 1k useres whos left over 350 rates. I made whole design, back-end and front-end on my own.

name: SaveSmall.org
description: That project was created during the COVID19 Global Hackathon. I was responsible for front end development in 5 people international team. I just a four days we created a service helping small businesses around the world to survive.  After the hackathon, I continued to work on that with other team members.

name: Better Librus
description: This project was created because I was struggled using the official Librus app and I decided to make my own version of it. Data are fetched from Librus using their REST API and used on a front-end. Right now it provides grades information and latest announcements. You can try it out using login: 13335 and password: librus11

name: Quiz Fighters
description: This project took 1st place in “koduj web app” contents organised by GUS Poland. It is dynamic web application with users authorization. Site makes statistics data more fun and attractive to the young people.
